text:
11 August 1953
Mr» Graydon Ausmus, President
NAEB
Box 2002
University, Alabama
Dear Graydon:
I am sending to you a copy of a letter from Everett Parker,
director of the Communications Research Project of the
National Council of Churches.
I don’t think I can go ahead and answer this letter, so I
am suggesting that Dallas confirm to you his understanding
of the agreement between the NAEB and the Comunications
.Research Project in order that you may reply to Everett.
With best regards,
Sincerely yours.
GEPsPN
Enclosure
cos NAEB Executive Committee
Mi*. Dallas Smythe
